text: Hi, I’m trying to create my own footer module, is there anyway to replicate the default footer module Office Location functionality?
I’ve tried duplicating the default footer module and it includes all the fields except the Office Location one. Is this something that HubSpot does not want a user to be able to use?
As an alternative, is there a way for me to get the other location options using tokens e.g. {{ site_settings.company_street_address_1.branch2 }}
